scripts.dev: npm -w shared run build && concurrently -n api,web -c blue,green "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:web"
scripts.build: npm -w shared run build && npm -w apps/api run build && npm -w apps/web run build
scripts.test: npm -w shared run build && npm -w apps/api run test
scripts.typecheck: npm -w shared run build && npm -w apps/api run typecheck && npm -w apps/web run typecheck
